author: .paulharris
content: im not sure about the `genesis.ssz` in there, at least i'm having issues syncing from genesis and it sounded like <@363800010518822915> may be also

author: ajsutton
content: There must be a correct genesis.ssz somewhere on the teku instance that was used as the `--initial-state` when it started up.

author: ajsutton
content: Teku is likely in prune mode so you can't get it from the API but if it's setup like other testnets the genesis file is likely on the box somewhere.

author: potuz
content: The genesis file is found in `custom_config_data/genesis.ssz` <@680234424037670912> <@363800010518822915>

author: .paulharris
content: i was using that genesis.ssz, will see if i can get better info on what went wrong
